body_html:
Please add other padding modes, as ‘wrap’ in numpy.pad. (as also requested by @FedericoMuciaccia )
Besides, could anyone give me a clue that how to implement 'wrap' padding using only the current tensorflow functions? Thanks in advance.

body:
Please add other padding modes, as ‘wrap’ in numpy.pad. (as also requested by @FedericoMuciaccia )
Besides, could anyone give me a clue that how to implement 'wrap' padding using only the current tensorflow functions?  Thanks in advance.
